mdRecord.dcterms:title: Richmond [1862-1865] / from surveys under the direction of Bvt. Brig. Gen. N. Michler, Maj. of Engineers and Bvt. Lieut. Col. P.S. Michie, Capt. of Engineers by command of Bvt. Maj. Genl. A.A. Humpreys, Brig. Genl. & Chief of Engineers, 1867 ; surveyed & drawn by Maj. J.E. Weyss, assisted by F. Theilkuhl, J. Strasser & G. Thompson
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bien, Julius, 1826-1909
Humphreys, A. A. (Andrew Atkinson), 1810-1883
Michie, Peter Smith, 1839-1901
Michler, N. (Nathaniel), 1827-1881
N.Y. Lith. & Eng. Co.
Weyss, J. E.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Photolith. by the N.Y. Lithographic, Engraving & Printing Co., Julius Bien, Supt.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In this issue, troop positions are shown in red and blue, but the background and river are not colored.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: marginal chips and tears, with lose of text at bottom centerfold.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Richmond (Va.)--Maps
